titles.title: Consular Review Act of 1996

To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to establish a Board of Visa Appeals within the Department of State to review decisions of consular officers concerning visa applications, revocations and cancellations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 2/27/1996--Introduced. Consular Review Act of 1996 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to establish within the Department of State a Board of Visa Appeals to review consular decisions regarding specified visa applications, revocations, and cancellations. Provides that Board review requests shall be a fee-based service.
